translations: 使走样，败坏；腐蚀，使堕落；使性欲反常，使性变态；歪曲，曲解

sentences.sentence: Some people believe that television can pervert the minds of children.
sentences.translation: 有些人认为，电视能腐蚀儿童的心灵。

sentences.sentence: Any reform will destroy and pervert our constitution.
sentences.translation: 任何改革都将破坏、败坏我们的宪法。

sentences.sentence: They were accused of attempting to pervert the course of justice.
sentences.translation: 他们因企图妨碍司法公正而被控。
